T02TD3225E:225b-0: @225b sa ra sva tvi sva dha nam /
T02TD3225E:225b-3: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gsung mnga'i 'od zer spro mdzad ngag ni mtshar ba'i ro dbyangs dang ldan pas //
T02TD3225E:225b-4: myang ba rnams la phan mdzad rgal dka' mi zad gti mug mun pa nye bar 'joms mdzad ma //
T02TD3225E:225b-5: yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can ma khyod la 'dud 'dir de'i yan lag mnyes byed pa //
T02TD3225E:225b-6: blo gros rtogs dka'i dbang du byas nas 'gor la phan phyir bde bar gshegs su lugs bshad par bya //
T02TD3225E:225b-7: dang po nyid du gdong sogs dag par byas la rab tu snga bar brtse ldan bzod pa can //
T02TD3225E:225b-8: byams pa mgu bas rangs pa'i dga' ba dang ldan gang yin sngags pas gtsang ma'i gos dang ni //
T02TD3225E:225b-9: gnas kyang yid 'phrog par ni nyin yang rung ste rang gi snying gar padma blta bar bya //
T02TD3225E:225b-10: der ni dri med aa las nges par byung ba'i zla ba legs par bsgom bya de la yang //
T02TD3225E:225b-11: do: yig 'od zer gyis ni dgang bar bya dang phyogs mtha' kun du khyab bya de las ni //
T02TD3225E:225b-12: mdun du sangs rgyas tshogs rnams blta bya me tog la sogs mchod la 'di dag bsgom par bya //
T02TD3225E:225b-13: de nas phyag 'tshal yang ni 'di yis sdig pa so sor bshags bya de bzhin bsod nams la //
T02TD3225E:225b-14: rjes su yi rang gsum la skyabs 'gro yang dag par ni brjod par bya ba'o sngags rig pas //
T02TD3225E:225b-15: zhes sogs bsngo byas par ni legs byas yang dag bdag nyid kyang ste rtog pa'i dra pa ni //
T02TD3225E:225b-16: thams cad de yis stong par dmigs bya de nas sna tshogs 'di dag ma lus bsgom bya ba //
T02TD3225E:225b-17: gcig dang du bral dang ldan tshig ni brjod bya dag pa dam pa'i ye shes kyis rig bya //
T02TD3225E:225b-18: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no //
T02TD3225E:225b-19: stod nyid las ni nges byung padma zla ba dag la nyer gnas do: yig dmar po'o //
T02TD3225E:225b-20: yang ni sna tshogs 'od zer tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes gyur de las padma 'dab brgyad pa //
T02TD3225E:225b-21: de las dmar mo 'od zer cher 'bar bcom ldan 'das ma dam pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan ma //
T02TD3225E:225b-22: g-yas bskum pa yi zhabs kyis gnas shing zhal gsum ma ste phyag drug dag gis brgyan pa mo //
T02TD3225E:225b-23: zhal g-yas mthing nag dang ni padma ral gri gri gug rnams ni bsnams pas phyag rgyas shing //
T02TD3225E:225b-24: g-yon zhal dkar po dang ni de bzhi thod bcas rin chen dam pa dang ni 'khor lo bsnams //
T02TD3225E:226a-0: snying gi padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su @226a nyer gnas der yang do: ni 'bar gyur pas //
T02TD3225E:226a-1: sna tshogs pa yi gti mug nye bar bcom pas byas shing spros pa yis ni 'jig rten dag byas te //
T02TD3225E:226a-2: nye bar bsdus la rang snying zla ba sa bon la ni bzhag par blta bya yang ni spro //
T02TD3225E:226a-3: de nyid 'dir ni yud tsam yud tsam nyi ma re rer bsgom bya rtag tu de lta ba'i //
T02TD3225E:226a-4: bsgoms byas skyon 'di yis 'dir ni sa bon tshogs pa legs par btang la 'di yi sngags //
T02TD3225E:226a-5: phreng ba brgyud pa mar me'i rnam pa'i rim pas snying por gyur pa'i sngags 'di 'dra ba bzlas //
T02TD3225E:226a-6: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni dzva la dzva zla me dha bardha ni dhi ri dhi ri budhi bardha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD3225E:226a-7: lha mo'i sku ni yid la brtag bya rab tu dga' bas thun tshod rnams ni thams cad la //
T02TD3225E:226a-8: sngags ni legs bzla bde gshegs lugs kyis sems can don phyir 'di dag yongs su bsngo ba dang //
T02TD3225E:226a-9: dgos pa sgrub pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig gnas par bya ba'o ji srid du //
T02TD3225E:226a-10: 'bum phrag dag na ma rdzogs pas te rdzogs par gyur pa dang ni las kyi rim pa yin //
T02TD3225E:226a-11: mi mthun phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad nye bar bcom pa'i bsam gtan byas pa nyid na de //
T02TD3225E:226a-12: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas ni ji srid zla tshes gnas par gyur par rang gi yid dang ni //
T02TD3225E:226a-13: de srid nub re bzhin du legs par sbyar ba nyid bya ji srid zla ba nya yi bar //
T02TD3225E:226a-14: mtshan mo de nyid la yang 'di ni grub thob rgyal bar dka' dang snyan dang gas pa nyid 'gyur //
T02TD3225E:226a-15: bcom ldan 'das ma dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can ma de yang dag mnyes byed gang yin pa //
T02TD3225E:226a-16: dpal ldan nag po'i rgyal pos dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud nas nye bar bton byas nas //
T02TD3225E:226a-17: sems can rnams ni don phyir mdzes bkod las byung bsod nams bdag gis thog mar thog gyur pa //
T02TD3225E:226a-18: des ni 'gro rnams nag po dang ni cha 'dra ba bzlog par dka' ba'i grub thob snyan dang gas shog / dpal 'dzin gyis byas sgrub thabs 'di //
T02TD3225E:226a-20: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
T02TD3225E:226a-21: 'jo byed nang gi khyad par yin //
T02TD3225E:226a-22: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs so /
T02TD3225E:226a-24: // / pandi ta chen po d'a dang aa bha ya dang aa ma ra la sogs pa las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
